processSteps.title: 90% science. 10% wigmaking. 100% precision.
processSteps.description: Behind every effortless look is a refined process. At Studio Pickens, technical mastery meets personal artistry—because no two heads (or stories) are alike.

processSteps.title: Consultation
processSteps.description: We begin with you. A deep-dive into your needs, lifestyle, and look. Expect questions. And good ones.

processSteps.title: Mapping the Head
processSteps.description: This is where the science comes in. Every contour is captured for a flawless, custom fit – no shortcuts, no guesswork.

processSteps.title: Artistry
processSteps.description: We tailor the foundation, and tie each hair by hand. Comfort and longevity are built in from the ground up.

processSteps.title: Refinement
processSteps.description: You see it. You feel it. You sign off when it's perfect.
